text:
Desimartini Emma Watson brings a classic back to life in new Beauty And The Beast clip 
A new clip from the upcoming live action version of Disney’s Beauty And The Beast has Emma Watson singing through her village as Belle. hollywood Updated: Feb 21, 2017 16:04 IST Hindustan Times Emma Watson is the perfect choice for a real-life Belle.(YouTube) 
Wake up from your provincial lives and check out this new clip from Beauty And The Beast! Emma Watson, who will play Belle in the live-action version of hit 1991 Disney animated film by the same name, is the star of the video as she sings the classic song Belle. 
She dons the same blue dress the animated princess wore in the original song, with the same gorgeous brown hair as she greets the baker and wonders if there is ‘something more than this provincial life’. 
The look and feel of the scene is much like the old film itself. Emma, however, does bring a flavour of teenage carefreeness and a more human body language rather than the perfect grace of the animated Belle. The opening number shows Belle walk through her small French village, buying bread and on her way to the library. She is met by the many watchful eyes of the village folk who find her behaviour peculiar. She is the only one who reads in the village and dreams of a better life beyond what is being offered to her. 
In the original Beauty And The Beast, Belle is abducted by a beast who is a prince under a curse. Slowly, as she gets to know him better, they fall in love with each other.
